name: slider
description: Select a number from a defined discrete range

fields.data:
Slider Properties:
⦿help – explain input pattern and purpose. can be displayed on ❔ button click
⦿default – This is the default value of the slider. This will appear on the slider when page loads, if not set initial value is set to (minimum + maximum)/2 
⦿range – The minimum and maximum values of the slider. By default set to 0 and 100 respectively
⦿stepBy - Amount that the value of the input will increment by. By default this is set to 1.
⦿readonly – If true, the slider won’t be functional and it will be greyed out
⦿showIf - reveal/hide fields according to switch state, for more information go to the ShowIf example
